product_name: The North Face Darkwind Shell Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Darkwind Shell jacket for men is two-faced, but we mean that in a good way. Wind-resistant front and highly breathable back work to ensure comfort when climbing with a pack. Tightly woven recycled polyester with a Durable Water Repellent finish blocks wind and sheds water. TNF(R) Apex Aerobic fabric on back promotes breathability in the areas a pack normally covers; additional DWR finish fends off rain when worn alone. 2 zippered front pockets are pack and harness compatible. The North Face Darkwind Shell jacket features a hidden cinch cord accessed via the pockets for a snug, personalized fit. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Darkwind Shell jacket for men is two-faced, but we mean that in a good way. Wind-resistant front and highly breathable back work to ensure comfort when climbing with a pack.
